name: Radiance-2017 (CREDIT AND ACCOUNTS RECEIVABLE INNOVATION CONFERENCE)
content: "This 2-day event brings together more than 1,000 finance, credit and accounts receivable leaders and practitioners from CPG, Apparel, Food and Food Services, Industrial and Chemical Manufacturing, Energy, Wholesale/Distribution, Pharmaceuticals, Hi-tech, Services, and Transportation and Logistics looking to exchange lessons learned and best practices that provide immediate improvement in operations and efficiency. During the conference, you will: 1\. Understand how the latest technology is transforming the credit and AR workplace and why you cannot afford to fall behind 2\. Enhance your expertise with proven strategies and solutions to implement with your team for immediate ROI 3\. Discover how your peers are using HighRadius solutions to uncover advanced functionality and hear about new, upcoming features 4\. Identify concrete steps to improve operational efficiency and reduce costs to overachieve on KPIs across credit, accounts receivable and payments operations 5\. Network and exchange experiences, best practices and lessons learned with more than 1000 attendees that will help you succeed back in the office"
